name: cloudflare-rag-mcp
description: Personal RAG knowledge base using Cloudflare Vectorize and MCP integration for Claude

scripts.check:docs: npx wrangler d1 execute myrag-metadata --remote --command 'SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM documents'
scripts.check:chunks: npx wrangler d1 execute myrag-metadata --remote --command 'SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM chunks'
scripts.check:sync: npx wrangler d1 execute myrag-metadata --remote --command 'SELECT * FROM sync_log ORDER BY sync_started_at DESC LIMIT 5'
